translation: Therefore, O mighty-armed Arjuna, his knowledge is steady whose senses are completely restrained from sense objects.
commentary: 2.68 Tasmat therefore? whose whose? Mighty-armed O mightyarmed? restrained restrained? All in all completely? The senses the senses? from the senseobjects? His his? Prajna knowledge? Pratishthita is steady.Commentary When the senses are completely controlled? the mind cannot wander wildly in the sensual grooves. It becomes steady like the lamp in a windless place. The Yogi is now established in the Self and his knowledge is steady. (Cf.III.7).
